mainText:
Dear Jobs,
 
Yesterday morning, Apple gave us some new presents - iphone 4s and ios5 and so on, but this morning, we lost you!
 
You are one of the best gifts that the God for the world!
 
You wanted to changed the world, and you have changed the world! So when you leaving, you must be smiling!
 
I am remembering you in China! Thank you for your jobs to this world!
header: A Chinese Apple and Jobs Fan
author: Leigh
